dmca.title: DMCA/theplanet.com AUP violations by webprox.net
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Sybil Shearin [mailto:sibyl@sandstorm.net] 
Posted At: Tuesday, October 31, 2006 11:07 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: DMCA/theplanet.com AUP violations by webprox.net
Subject: DMCA/theplanet.com AUP violations by webprox.net



My name is Sybil Shearin, and I am Director of Communications for
Sandstorm Enterprises. Sandstorm Enterprises is the copyright holder for
content appearing on www.sandstorm.net. I am authorized to act on behalf
of Sandstorm Enterprises in this matter.

The main page of our web site is located at http://www.sandstorm.net.
This page incorporates our trademarked intellectual property (in the
form of images, words, and phrases) and is copyright Sandstorm
Enterprises, as noted at the bottom of the page.


If you visited
http://webprox.net/index.php?q=aHR0cDovL3d3dy5zYW5kc3Rvcm0ubmV0Lw%3D%3D
prior to this weekend, you would have seen the content from
http://www.sandstorm.net, framed by webprox.net. This entity is not
authorized to frame Sandstorm's content. Further, by framing Sandstorm's
content, they have violated the DMCA and the  "Intellectual Property
Infringement Policy" specified by your Acceptable Use Policy, as well as
significantly affected our site's standing on the Google search results.

We have taken steps to prevent this proxying, by redirecting HTTP
requests from 70.87.44.194 to return a page advising customers to go
directly to www.sandstorm.net.


We ask that you apply the penalties specified in your AUP, and shut down
the webprox.net account.


Under penalty of perjury, this information is accurate, and I am
authorized to act on behalf of the copyright holder.

Regards,
--S.

-- 
Sybil Shearin
Director of Communications
Sandstorm Enterprises, Inc.
14 Summer Street
Malden, MA 02148
781.333.3200
